name: openttd-coopetition
description: OpenTTD Coopetition GameScript with development tools

scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:nut && npm run lint:workspaces
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:yaml && npm run validate:docs
scripts.build:mod: mkdir -p dist && zip -r dist/coopetition-v$(grep -o 'COOPETITION_VERSION = [0-9]\+' src/version.nut | grep -o '[0-9]\+').zip src/*.nut LICENSE README.md
scripts.build:content: npm run compile && mkdir -p dist && zip -r dist/coopetition-content-v$(grep -o 'COOPETITION_VERSION = [0-9]\+' src/version.nut | grep -o '[0-9]\+').zip build/goals/*.nut build/scenarios/*.nut build/campaigns/*.nut build/index.nut
scripts.build:tools: mkdir -p dist && zip -r dist/coopetition-tools-v$(grep -o 'COOPETITION_VERSION = [0-9]\+' src/version.nut | grep -o '[0-9]\+').zip workspaces/ package.json package-lock.json eslint.config.mjs
scripts.build:all: npm run build:mod && npm run build:content && npm run build:tools
scripts.test: npm run lint:all && npm run validate:all && npm run test:workspaces
